data.sentence: The word الْكَوَاكِبُ comes from the root ك و ك ب and is associated with the meanings: To shine, glisten.

data.meanings: to scatter/disperse/sprinkle a thing, to hasten or be quick
data.sentence: The word انْتَثَرَتْ comes from the root ن ث ر and is associated with the meanings: to scatter/disperse/sprinkle a thing, to hasten or be quick
